description.narrative: Focus was on providing child protection services to refugees, IDP, returned children and vulnerable host population: community based psychosocial support, psychological support to children suspected of association with armed group, Identification, documentation and reunification for unaccompanied children and the protection of children at risk of being used by armed group. | Status:Met | As-of Date:29/12/2017
